dcterms:description: The 3DPW dataset contains 60 sequences captured outdoors, providing global human pose information, but it is challenging to use for evaluation due to severe drift.

dcterms:description: AMASS is an archive of motion capture data that provides a large amount of sequence data from a wide range of human actions.

dcterms:description: The Mannequin Challenge dataset consists of videos that include static people in a moving camera environment, useful for evaluating human pose estimation methods.
